name: gank
description: Solana trading terminal for AI agents. Launch tokens on pump.fun, run swarm buys, volume bots, copy trades, and manage multi-wallet operations.
author: pissdart

skills.name: Launch Token
skills.description: Launch a token on pump.fun with dev buy, bundle wallets, and snipers. Handles IPFS upload and vanity mint reservation.

skills.name: Swarm Buy
skills.description: Coordinated parallel buys from multiple wallets simultaneously on any pump.fun token.

skills.name: Volume Bot
skills.description: Run automated volume generation sessions with configurable intensity and duration.

skills.name: Copy Trade
skills.description: Mirror another wallet's trades automatically with configurable size limits and delay.

skills.name: Wallet Operations
skills.description: Transfer, split, consolidate, and drain wallets. Includes privacy swap (SOL→XMR→SOL).

skills.name: Positions
skills.description: Monitor token holdings and PnL across all wallets. Sell on target multipliers.

skills.name: Market Data
skills.description: Token info, OHLCV charts, holders, recent trades, and trader analytics.

apiKey.description: GANK API key (starts with pb_). Get from gank.dev → Settings → API Keys.

security.note: API keys start with pb_ and authenticate all requests. Wallet private keys are encrypted server-side and never returned by the API. Never expose GANK_API_KEY in logs or LLM context.
